subtitle.en: First, match the witches, and then identify them!
subtitle.zh: 先配对女巫，然后识别她们！

text.en: Click tiles to reveal witches. Match pairs, then click the correct name to identify them!
text.zh: 点击方块显示女巫。配对相同女巫，然后点击正确名字识别她们！

descriptions.en: This is Elphaba, from the 2003 Broadway show Wicked!
descriptions.zh: 这是艾尔法芭，来自2003年百老汇音乐剧《女巫前传》！

descriptions.en: This is Elphaba, from the 2024 movie 'Wicked'.
descriptions.zh: 这是艾尔法芭，来自2024年电影《女巫前传》。

descriptions.en: This is the Wicked Witch of the West, from the 1939 movie 'The Wizard of Oz'.
descriptions.zh: 这是西方邪恶女巫，来自1939年电影《绿野仙踪》。

descriptions.en: This is Galinda, the Good Witch of the North, from the Broadway show Wicked!
descriptions.zh: 这是葛琳达，北方好女巫，来自百老汇音乐剧《女巫前传》！

descriptions.en: This is Galinda, the Good Witch, from the 2024 movie 'Wicked'.
descriptions.zh: 这是葛琳达，好女巫，来自2024年电影《女巫前传》。

descriptions.en: This is Glinda, the Good Witch of the North, from the 1939 movie 'The Wizard of Oz'.
descriptions.zh: 这是格林达，北方好女巫，来自1939年电影《绿野仙踪》。

descriptions.en: Endora, Samantha's mother, from the TV show 'Bewitched'
descriptions.zh: 恩朵拉，萨曼莎的母亲，来自电视剧《家有仙妻》

descriptions.en: Grandmama Addams, the family matriarch, from 'The Addams Family'
descriptions.zh: 亚当斯奶奶，家族女家长，来自《亚当斯一家》

descriptions.en: Hermione Granger, from the Harry Potter series
descriptions.zh: 赫敏·格兰杰，来自《哈利·波特》系列

descriptions.en: Jadis, the White Witch, from 'The Chronicles of Narnia'
descriptions.zh: 贾迪斯，白女巫，来自《纳尼亚传奇》

descriptions.en: Kiki, the young witch, from Studio Ghibli's 'Kiki's Delivery Service'
descriptions.zh: 琪琪，年轻女巫，来自吉卜力工作室的《魔女宅急便》

descriptions.en: Jiji, Kiki's cat familiar, from Studio Ghibli's 'Kiki's Delivery Service'
descriptions.zh: 吉吉，琪琪的猫咪伙伴，来自吉卜力工作室的《魔女宅急便》

descriptions.en: Lafayette Reynolds, the powerful medium, from the TV show 'True Blood'
descriptions.zh: 拉斐特·雷诺兹，强大的灵媒，来自电视剧《真爱如血》

descriptions.en: Melisandre, the Red Priestess, from 'Game of Thrones'
descriptions.zh: 梅丽珊卓，红袍女祭司，来自《权力的游戏》

descriptions.en: Mildred Hubble, from 'The Worst Witch' book and TV series
descriptions.zh: 米尔德雷德·哈布尔，来自《糟糕女巫》书籍和电视剧

descriptions.en: Morticia Addams, the gothic matriarch, from 'The Addams Family'
descriptions.zh: 魔蒂西亚·亚当斯，哥特式女家长，来自《亚当斯一家》

descriptions.en: Professor Minerva McGonagall, from the Harry Potter series
descriptions.zh: 米勒娃·麦格教授，来自《哈利·波特》系列

descriptions.en: Sabrina Spellman, the teenage witch, from 'Sabrina the Teenage Witch'
descriptions.zh: 莎宾娜·斯佩尔曼，少女女巫，来自《少年魔法师》

descriptions.en: Salem, Sabrina's wise-cracking cat familiar, from 'Sabrina the Teenage Witch'
descriptions.zh: 塞勒姆，莎宾娜的诙谐猫咪伙伴，来自《少年魔法师》

descriptions.en: Samantha Stephens, the suburban witch, from the TV show 'Bewitched'
descriptions.zh: 萨曼莎·史蒂文斯，郊区女巫，来自电视剧《家有仙妻》

descriptions.en: Tabitha Stephens, Samantha's daughter, from 'Bewitched'
descriptions.zh: 塔比莎·史蒂文斯，萨曼莎的女儿，来自《家有仙妻》

descriptions.en: Wednesday Addams, the dark daughter, from 'The Addams Family'
descriptions.zh: 星期三·亚当斯，黑暗女儿，来自《亚当斯一家》

descriptions.en: Wendy, the Good Little Witch, from Harvey Comics
descriptions.zh: 温蒂，善良的小女巫，来自哈维漫画

descriptions.en: Willow Rosenberg, the powerful witch, from 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer'
descriptions.zh: 薇洛·罗森伯格，强大女巫，来自《吸血鬼猎人巴菲》

descriptions.en: Witch Hazel, from Looney Tunes cartoons
descriptions.zh: 女巫榛子，来自乐一通卡通

descriptions.en: Yubaba, the bathhouse owner, from Studio Ghibli's 'Spirited Away'
descriptions.zh: 汤婆婆，澡堂老板娘，来自吉卜力工作室的《千与千寻》

descriptions.en: Agatha Harkness, the powerful witch, from Marvel Comics
descriptions.zh: 阿加莎·哈克尼斯，强大女巫，来自漫威漫画

descriptions.en: Bai Suzhen, the White Snake spirit, from Chinese legend 'Legend of the White Snake'
descriptions.zh: 白素贞，白蛇精灵，来自中国传说《白蛇传》

descriptions.en: Circe, the enchantress, from Homer's Odyssey
descriptions.zh: 瑟茜，女魔法师，来自荷马的《奥德赛》

descriptions.en: Dani and Dorian Wytte, twin witches, from the webcomic 'Hooky'
descriptions.zh: 达妮和多里安·怀特，双胞胎女巫，来自网络漫画《Hooky》

descriptions.en: Esme Weatherwax, the formidable witch, from Terry Pratchett's Discworld series
descriptions.zh: 埃斯梅·韦瑟韦克斯，令人敬畏的女巫，来自特里·普拉切特的《碟形世界》系列

descriptions.en: Morgan le Fay, the powerful enchantress, from Arthurian legend
descriptions.zh: 摩根勒菲，强大女魔法师，来自亚瑟王传说

descriptions.en: Nie Xiaoqian, the ghost spirit, from 'Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio'
descriptions.zh: 聂小倩，鬼魂精灵，来自《聊斋志异》

descriptions.en: Shuimu, the Water Mother spirit, from Chinese folklore
descriptions.zh: 水母，水母精灵，来自中国民间传说

descriptions.en: The Weird Sisters, the three witches, from Shakespeare's 'Macbeth'
descriptions.zh: 命运三女巫，三个女巫，来自莎士比亚的《麦克白》

descriptions.en: Xianniang, the powerful witch, from Disney's 'Mulan' (2020)
descriptions.zh: 仙娘，强大女巫，来自迪士尼的《花木兰》(2020)
